<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Claws of the Dragon](/Feats.aspx?ID=1941) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 168 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Dragon Disciple](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=56)

**Prerequisites**
[Dragon Disciple Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1940)

</column>

---

Your fingernails grow into razor-sharp claws, and scales speckle your fingers, hands, and wrists. Your claws are [agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179) [unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199) attacks that deal 1d6 slashing damage and are in the [brawling](/WeaponGroups.aspx?ID=4) weapon group.

 If you're a draconic sorcerer, when you cast [_dragon claws_](/Spells.aspx?ID=500), increase the spell's slashing damage die from d4 to d6 and increase the resistance to 10 at 1st level, 15 at 5th level, and 20 at 9th level.
